api_list.name: Extract Keywords
api_list.description: Easily retrieve keywords within your text. This API automatically analyses your input (tokenization, pos-tagging, lemmatization) and erases stop words to help you identify main keywords within a text (such as vers, common nouns, proper nouns, adjectives, adverbs).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://french-keywords-extraction.p.rapidapi.com/rapidapi_keywords"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "french-keywords-extraction.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://french-keywords-extraction.p.rapidapi.com/rapidapi_keywords"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "french-keywords-extraction.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
